salon.name: Lavanya Salon
salon.description: Premier hair and beauty salon offering a range of services to make you look and feel your best.

services.name: Haircut & Styling
services.description: Professional haircut and styling tailored to your preferences and hair type.

services.name: Color Treatment
services.description: Full color, highlights, balayage, or specialized color treatments.

services.name: Facial Treatments
services.description: Rejuvenating facials customized for your skin type and concerns.

services.name: Manicure & Pedicure
services.description: Nail care and polish application for hands and feet.

testimonials.name: Sarah J.
testimonials.text: Lavanya Salon transformed my look completely! Their stylists are true artists.

testimonials.name: Michael T.
testimonials.text: Best haircut I've ever had. The staff is professional and the ambiance is perfect.

ramplumber.name: Ram the Plumber
ramplumber.description: Professional plumbing services for residential and commercial properties. Available 24/7 for emergencies.

services.name: Emergency Repairs
services.description: 24/7 emergency plumbing repairs for leaks, bursts, and blockages.

services.name: Bathroom Installation
services.description: Complete bathroom installation and renovation services.

services.name: Drain Cleaning
services.description: Professional drain cleaning and unclogging services.

services.name: Water Heater Service
services.description: Installation, repair, and maintenance of water heaters.

testimonials.name: Jennifer K.
testimonials.text: Ram fixed our emergency leak at 2 AM! Fast, professional, and reasonably priced.

testimonials.name: David L.
testimonials.text: Excellent service. Ram installed our new bathroom fixtures perfectly and on budget.

techhub.name: TechHub Solutions
techhub.description: Your one-stop shop for IT services, computer repair, and technical support.

services.name: Computer Repair
services.description: Diagnosis and repair of hardware and software issues for all devices.

services.name: Network Setup
services.description: Home and office network installation and configuration.

services.name: Data Recovery
services.description: Recovery of lost or corrupted data from various storage devices.

services.name: IT Consultation
services.description: Professional IT advice for businesses and individuals.

testimonials.name: Robert J.
testimonials.text: TechHub recovered all my important files when I thought they were lost forever. Lifesavers!

testimonials.name: Amanda P.
testimonials.text: Great service setting up our office network. Everything runs smoothly now.
